sections.content: The integration of Large Language Models into development processes fundamentally changes workflows. GitHub Copilot studies document productivity increases of 55 percent. However, this adoption occurs without systematic methodologies.
On February 3, 2025, Andrej Karpathy coined the term 'Vibe Coding'. This describes an AI-supported programming practice where developers generate code through vague natural language instructions.

sections.author: Andrej Karpathy
sections.content: Ask yourself regularly and honestly whether you really still understand what's happening.
The approach leads to rapid results. However, technical debt accumulates exponentially. Understanding decreases with each generated iteration.

Promptotyping offers a structured alternative to intuitive Vibe Coding. The method combines AI-assisted development with systematic documentation, continuous validation, and explicit knowledge externalization.

sections.title: Core Innovation
sections.content: Understanding emerges through building, not as a prerequisite. The development process follows the cycle: describe, generate, test, understand.
